channel.title: Sai Bharadwaj Reddy
channel.description: Recent content on Sai Bharadwaj Reddy

item.title: cv
item.description: This is my CV till date…. Sai Bharadwaj Reddy EDUCATION Master of Science , Computer Science Jan 2020 - Dec 2021 University of North Carolina at Charlotte GPA: 4.0 Bachelor of Technology , Computer Science Jul 2015 - Jul 2019 Karunya Institute of Technology and Sciences GPA: 3.0 EXPERIENCE Graduate Research Assistant , THinC Lab - University of North Carolina, Charlotte Jun 2021 - Aug 2021 Designed and Implemented Control-Simulations of shared Human-AI interaction of the steering wheel in Autonomous vehicles.

Hello. I’m currently pursuing my Master’s in computer science, with a concentration In AI and Robotics, from the University of North Carolina at Charlotte. My interest lies in Artificial General Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science, and I have research-based experience in Interactive Deep-Reinforcement Learning, Legged robotics perception and navigation, and Brain-computer interfaces. Having worked on academic research projects in Machine Learning, Probabilistic modeling, Natural Language Processing, and Data Analysis for the past 2 years, I understand the challenges and creativity required to implement models.
